event.title: International Perfume Fans Party
event.description:
Update!!!
To non-Japanese attendees!

Meet me at west exit of JR Suido-bashi station at 18:45. I’ll take you to the IZAKAYA. Be aware! There is another Suido-bashi station in subway line. Please find “JR” line Suido-bashi Station. Those who cannot go there by that time, please check the map above. Google map show you the exact place of it with “A”

I’d like to welcome all the Perfume Fans from around the world at Japanese drinking bar “IZAKAYA” near Tokyo Dome. Let me and Japanese Perfume fans know how much you love Perfume!

>>How to apply.. by 10/27

Please click the big red button with white Japanese word at the right side.
First you have to login with your twitter or google or flicker ID.
Then the applying form will be displayed. Please fill out the blanks. (last big blank is the free comment space to be displayed at this site. please say hi to everyone!) and click the big red button with white Japanese word at the bottom again. That’s all you have to do!

>>Any comments?

Please leave a comment form at the bottom and click small red button.

>>After this party…

I’m thinking about going out to a Karaoke bar to sing Perfume songs! (21:00-23:00)
We can practice how to reply to A-chan’s regular Japanese calling at the stage and how to wave your hands or jump to their songs. It would be fun :-)

*English is the official language of this party.

To Japanese Perfume fans

Perfume東京ドームライブのために来日する志高きPerfumeファンを歓迎したいと思い企画しました。
あまり英語が話せなくてもPerfumeという共通ネタがあれば問題無。（サポートもできるだけします！）
今のところアメリカ人5人位が来る予定。
thispenguin も来ます。

ご質問があれば下のコメント欄からお願いします！

Yuko Nakamura
event.address: 東京都千代田区三崎町3-8-1
